speaker: narrator
dialog: You're in the cafeteria for lunch when as you're preparing to sit down Claire suddenly sits down at the table.

speaker: claire
dialog: Oh my! I didn't see the crumb that was you. Seems like I got to this seat first so run along dear commoner.

speaker: narrator
dialog: Looking around you spot Prince Rod motioning you to go sit with him however you also see Misha outside. What do you do?

speaker: narrator
dialog: You decide to sit with neither and instead find a lone seat in the corner to finish lunch at.

speaker: rod
dialog: Hey glad you could make it! How are you classes going so far?

speaker: misha
dialog: Oh hi! How are you classes going so far?

speaker: narrator
dialog: Eventually lunch wraps up and conversations die down before you head to your next class.
